description: Data was aggregated from the separated chromosomal abnormalities. Frequency counts of each structural abnormality are recorded.

fields.description: Arm of the chromosome (p or q)
fields.name: Arm

fields.description: Position of the gene on the p or q arm
fields.name: Band

fields.description: Morphology code from Koder table field Kod for the rows with 'MORPH' in the KodType field.
fields.name: Morph

fields.description: Topography code from the Koder table field Kod for the rows with 'TOP' in the KodType field.
fields.name: Topo

fields.description: Whether the aberration is balanced ('B') or unbalanced ('U')
fields.name: Type
